3. Application Services 3 Extension (AS3)¶

This section of the demo is for the integration of Application Services 3 Extension. The goal is to facilitate an automated configuration of L4-7 with a BIG-IP.

Assumptions This lab guide assumes you know how to use postman. If not follow this tutorial https://clouddocs.f5.com/training/community/waf/html/class7/module1/lab1/lab1.html

Important

AS3 is version agnostic and can simplify upgrades from one BIG-IP to another version.

Expected time to complete: 20 Minutes

  • 3.2. Using AS3 with Big-IQ
